Overview

• Development Timeline

Risks & Mitigation  
Consumer markets are highly competitive, and new products can underperform. Our disciplined go/no-go process limits total exposure to $10 million and prevents ongoing investment in underachieving concepts. Next Steps  
1. Finalize selection of one or two concepts by end of Month 1  
2. Secure cross-functional team and external partners for rapid prototyping  
3. Report back at six-month and nine-month gates with go/no-go recommendations
